Paragraph: The hole - only devices were constructed under optimized device conditions with the structure ITO / PEDOT : PSS / blends / Au.

Let's think step by step.

| PEDOT : PSS   |
| blends       |
| Au           |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole - only devices were constructed under optimized device conditions with the structure ITO / PEDOT : PSS / blends / Au.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole |
| devices |
| optimized device conditions |
| structure |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| blends |
| Au |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole |
| devices |
| optimized device conditions |
| structure |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| blends |

Note: "hole" can be considered a material property in the context of semiconductors. It refers to a region in a semiconductor material where the charge carrier concentration is lower than the intrinsic concentration. Therefore, it is included in the list. If the context changes and "hole" refers to a physical hole in an object, then it should not be included in the list.
